content:
180 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
    (xii) PHC requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
English Language, Literature in English and any 
other two (2) Arts or Social Science subjects  
(xiii) REDEEMER'S requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
to include English Language, Literature in English, 
one (1) other Arts subject and ‘O’ level pass in 
Mathematics.  
(xiv) UNN requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
subjects to include English language, L iterature in 
English, and one (1) Science subject.  
(xv) UYO does not require ‘O’ level credit pass in Fine 
Arts.  
UTME SUBJECTS  
(i) ABU requires Literature in English and other 
relevant subjects.  
(ii) BENIN accepts any two (2) Arts Subjects and 
another subject.  
(iii) FED-OYE EKITI requires any Language and two (2) 
other subjects.  
(iv) FED-OYEEKITI, NDU, ILORIN, and LASU require 
another Arts subject plus any Arts or Social Science 
subject. ILORIN accepts Science subject.  
(v) NDU and IBADAN accept any three (3) subjects.  
(vi) OAU requires Literature in English plus another Arts 
subject and any other subject.  
(vii) OOU requires Literature in English and two (2) other 
relevant subjects.  
(viii) REDEEMER'S requires any two (2) Arts subjects and 
Literature in English.  
(ix) UNN requires Literature in English and two (2) 
subjects from either Arts or Social Sciences.  
LINGUISTICS / EDO  
 BENIN             
  
  
(i) Two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes in GCE or  
 HSC  or  a  
recognised  
Five (5) SSC credit passes 
or TC II merits including  
 English  Language,  
LiteratureinEnglish and a  
Two (2) relevant 
Arts subjects and 
any other subject.  
  
UTME  
BENIN accepts ‘O’ level pass in English Language for 
candidates with distinction in Literature inEnglish.
